attributes.action: stop banks from investing any money
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Oxford English Dictionary defines a bank as: 
'an organization offering financial services, especially the safekeeping of customers’ money until required and making loans at interest'
Nowhere does it say anything about investing people's money with the hope they will be able to pay it back.
Banks investing money is what caused the recession, and if they continue there are going to be more recessions, getting steadily worse, until the economy, capitalism, and the entire system of money collapses.  People have lost jobs because of greed in the banks.  The banks should stick to their definition and stop continuing on their way to economic collapse.
